data.NAME: NEW
data.LABEL: New
data.DESCRIPTION: A service in this state is inactive. It does minimal work and consumes minimal resources.

data.NAME: STARTING
data.LABEL: Starting
data.DESCRIPTION: A service in this state is transitioning to Running.

data.NAME: RUNNING
data.LABEL: Running
data.DESCRIPTION: A service in this state is operational.

data.NAME: STOPPING
data.LABEL: Stopping
data.DESCRIPTION: A service in this state is transitioning to Terminated.

data.NAME: TERMINATED
data.LABEL: Terminated
data.DESCRIPTION: A service in this state has completed execution normally. It does minimal work and consumes minimal resources.

data.NAME: FAILED
data.LABEL: Failed
data.DESCRIPTION: A service in this state has encountered a problem and may not be operational. It cannot be started nor stopped.

data.NAME: RELOCATION
data.LABEL: Relocation
data.DESCRIPTION: An asset is being physically relocated.

data.NAME: IPMI_PROBLEM
data.LABEL: IPMI Problem
data.DESCRIPTION: An asset is experiencing IPMI issues and needs to be examined. It needs investigation.

data.NAME: HARDWARE_PROBLEM
data.LABEL: Hardware Problem
data.DESCRIPTION: An asset is experiencing a non-IPMI issue and needs to be examined. It needs investigation.

data.NAME: NETWORK_PROBLEM
data.LABEL: Network Problem
data.DESCRIPTION: An asset is experiencing a network problem that may or may not be hardware related. It needs investigation.

data.NAME: HARDWARE_UPGRADE
data.LABEL: Hardware Upgrade
data.DESCRIPTION: An asset is in need or in process of having hardware upgraded.

data.NAME: HW_TESTING
data.LABEL: Hardware Testing
data.DESCRIPTION: Performing some testing that requires putting the asset into a maintenance state.

data.NAME: MAINT_NOOP
data.LABEL: Maintenance NOOP
data.DESCRIPTION: Doing nothing, bouncing this through maintenance for my own selfish reasons.

data.NAME: HW_ON_FIRE
data.LABEL: Hardware on Fire
data.DESCRIPTION: Use this state if hardware has caught on fire
